trans-unit.source: Specifies the button style within a toolbar.
trans-unit.target: 指定工具列中的按鈕樣式。

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used by members such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName>成員使用這個列舉型別

trans-unit.source: The toolbar button appearance is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Appearance%2A> property of the toolbar.
trans-unit.target: 工具列按鈕的外觀由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Appearance%2A>工具列的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Appearance%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Appearance%2A> property to `Flat` will give the toolbar and its buttons a flat appearance.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Appearance%2A>屬性`Flat`會提供工具列和其按鈕平面外觀。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Appearance%2A>

trans-unit.source: As the mouse pointer moves over the buttons, they take on a three-dimensional appearance.
trans-unit.target: 將滑鼠指標移到按鈕，它們就需要&3;d 外觀。

trans-unit.source: Also, when the toolbar has a flat appearance, button separators appear as a line rather than as a space between the buttons.
trans-unit.target: 此外，當工具列有平面外觀時，按鈕分隔符號會顯示為一行，而不是按鈕之間的空白。

trans-unit.source: A drop-down control that displays a menu or other window when clicked.
trans-unit.target: 顯示功能表，或是按下時，其他視窗的下拉式清單控制項。

trans-unit.source: A space or line between toolbar buttons.
trans-unit.target: 空格或工具列按鈕之間的線條。

trans-unit.source: The appearance depends on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Appearance*> property.
A toggle button that appears sunken when clicked and retains the sunken appearance until clicked again.
trans-unit.target: 再次按下凹按下時，並保留直到下凹的外觀的切換按鈕。
